subject: Basketball (College)
National Invitation Tournament
lead_paragraph: The N.C.A.A., the N.I.T. and the Madison Square Garden Company announced a three-year agreement to keep the N.I.T. Season Tip-Off semifinals and title game at the New York arena.
snippet: The N.C.A.A., the N.I.T. and the Madison Square Garden Company announced a three-year agreement to keep the N.I.T. Season Tip-Off semifinals and title game at the New York arena.
